compounddef.initializer: template<template< typename... > class MaterialToCheck, typename Material> concept Ikarus::Concepts::IsMaterial = Impl::isMaterial<MaterialToCheck, Material>()

briefdescription.para: Concept defining the requirements for a material type.

detaileddescription.para:
MaterialToCheck
Template representing the material type to check.
Material
Type representing the material to be checked.
A type satisfies the IsMaterial concept if it meets one of the following conditions:

listitem.para: The material is a specialization of the specified template MaterialToCheck.
The material is a specialization of VanishingStress or VanishingStrain (i.e. reduced) with an underlying type that is a specialization of the specified template MaterialToCheck.
